name: Candy Baby Care
description:
Are you girls ready for an amazing challenge? In one of the best baby house cleaning games there is, Candy Baby Care - Babysitter Game, you will have to clean up the house because of the new born baby. After you have cleaned the house you will have to be a babysitter. You have to do everything a real babysitter has to do, in this baby care game for kids. So do you want to be a babysitter? Then you should definitely download this baby spa and salon game. You have to entertain the baby, change her diaper, prepare the bed she has to sleep in and clean up the house. You can reward yourself with a lollipop whenever you complete a task in this baby care game for kids. This is definitely one of the best baby house cleaning games there is!

Candy Baby Care - Babysitter Game features:
- One of the best baby house cleaning games there is
- A realistic baby care game for kids
- Prepare the bed for the baby
- Change her diaper and do everything a real life babysitter has to do
- Easy to play baby spa and salon
- Fun for all ages
- A very educational game

So do you love babies and do you like taking care of babies then you should download this free girl baby care game.
